achievements.label: The Affair of the Messenger's Casket
achievements.descriptionunlocked: In a hidden fold of the mountains above the city of Cluj lies the enigmatic relic they call Saint Mihail's Coffin...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Grunewald Provision
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The assets of Grunewald's Permanent Circus were disposed of by the Bureau. In hindsight, this was a mistake...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Oriflamme Heist
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Oriflamme's Auction House is never robbed. But what if it has been?

achievements.label: The Affair of the Second Skin
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The labhite Abecassis has begun a dramatic and dangerous metamorphosis...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Endless Guest
achievements.descriptionunlocked: An 'inhabitation of Worms' is never to be taken lightly...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Dappled Rose
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Another man has died in the desert. He raved to the end about gardens, with a flower crushed in his hand...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Forgivable Debt
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Two Reckoner mobs have gone to war in the unremarkable Lithuanian city of Kaunas. Why? What's in Kaunas?

achievements.label: The Affair of the Particular Mystique
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Suppression Bureau has a growing interest in the recent fad for unconventional - often prophetic - religious movements...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Claw and the Clouds
achievements.descriptionunlocked: From the far monastery of St Tentreto, we hear stories of unexpected visitors - visitors from behind the sky...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Unfettered Eye
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Messana: a prosperous little desert village that has become a place of pilgrimage. There have been peculiar manifestations there of late...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Other Horizon
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Sailors have a term for the compass-whirl phenomenon which occurs before sightings of the city Ys...

achievements.label: The Affair of 'Apollo and Marsyas'
achievements.descriptionunlocked: An upcoming production of an opera with a very ancient pedigree indeed...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Invisible Opera
achievements.descriptionunlocked: No-one has ever successfully staged an entire performance of 'Wings Within Wings'. But now someone is trying again...

achievements.label: The Affair of the God in the Wood
achievements.descriptionunlocked: A faddish health camp has attracted attention after many of its clients seem to have developed sudden, sometimes upsetting, artistic abilities...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Unfinished Lark
achievements.descriptionunlocked: For years a sculptor-adept laboured at his masterpiece. And now, puzzlingly and suddenly, he is dead...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Royal Endeavour
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The New King has sanctioned the use of the Crown's wealth to fund a visionary new industrial project...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Threshold Revolution
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The LÃ©gion du Seuil recruits from among the Bounds-beasts. How trustworthy is it, really?

achievements.label: The Affair of the Rising While
achievements.descriptionunlocked: A self-styled oracle preaches 'the truth of nearly now' to her followers. She camps by the Temple of Seven Coils, and hasn't been eaten...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Sandalwood Saint
achievements.descriptionunlocked: An odd little image in a church in Strasbourg has become a locus for wild claims of healing and haunting. When it comes to the attention of the Church hierarchy, they'll rule it miraculous or heretical... unless someone takes a hand before then.

achievements.label: The Affair of the Friar's Tapestry
achievements.descriptionunlocked: A tapestry has been stolen from the Haustorium that depicts details of a very old rite indeed...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Absent Friend
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Ligeian Medusa is long dead. But she walks the streets of Budapest by moonlight and, for the first time, she's being glimpsed in daylight too...

achievements.label: The Affair of the Open Reverend
achievements.descriptionunlocked: In a highly specialised clinic, specialists study the ecstatic agonies of the case known only as'the Open Reverend'...

achievements.label: In the Mist
achievements.descriptionunlocked: What happens in Numa, stays in Numa. Generally.
